zh.views.Tokenizer.303491-0: Tokenizer是一个用于统计Token使用情况的工具
zh.views.Tokenizer.303491-2: 您是否经常遇到这样的场景？项目中需要使用到LLM的API，但是对实际耗费没有概念，不明白一段prompt究竟要消耗多少token，或者说，消耗多少经费？
zh.views.Tokenizer.303491-3: Tokenizer可以帮助您解决这个问题，它可以帮助您统计一段prompt的token使用情况，以及对应的经费消耗，同时，如果您使用了第三方API如API2D，其有相对于OpenAI 1.5倍的经费消耗，Tokenizer也可以帮助您统计这部分的经费消耗。
zh.views.Tokenizer.303491-4: 您可以直接访问我们的在线版本：
zh.views.Tokenizer.303491-5: 或者使用我们的开源代码自行部署：

en.views.Tokenizer.303491-0: Tokenizer is a tool for counting token usage
en.views.Tokenizer.303491-2: Have you ever encountered such a situation? The project needs to use a LLM API, but you have no concept of the actual consumption. And you don't know how many tokens a prompt will consume, or how much money it will cost?
en.views.Tokenizer.303491-3: Tokenizer can help you solve this problem. It can help you count the token usage of a prompt, and the corresponding cost. At the same time, if you use third-party APIs such as API2D, which has 1.5 times the cost of OpenAI, Tokenizer can also help you count the cost of this part.
en.views.Tokenizer.303491-4: You can access our online version directly:
en.views.Tokenizer.303491-5: Or use our open source code to deploy it yourself:
